pages.text: Tools and Armor can be disassembled in $(l)Disassembler/$.$(br)$(li)Softest item part picked for output first$(br)$(li)Both of tools should have harvest level higher$(br)$(li)Output amount based on material cost$(br)$(li)Also som more math
